---
title: "HKDataProcess"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

HK<-read_csv('../data/HongKongData.csv')

HK |>  select(part_id=pid,part_age = age,gender = sex,contacts = n.contact.total) |> 
  mutate(part_id = as_factor(part_id),
         part_age = as_factor(part_age),
         gender = as_factor(gender)) -> HKclean



  
```
